page.title: 04Employment In Hoo.
page.content: The increasing mechanisation of agriculture, and the closure of the local brickworks has meant that {employment}within the study area is mainly limited to firms on the Marina Industrial Estate, and tertiary sector {employment}in low order retail outlets and recreational centres, such as the Deangate sports comlex, the yachting marina and swimming pool. As a result villagers{commute}to nearby industrial sites, such as Grain and Kingsnorth Power Stations or further afield to the Medway Towns and London. Direct commuter coach links to London are increasingly popular.{Unemployment fears have been raised with the closure of the Grain Oil Refinery and the Chatham Naval Dockyard.
